Betting.description: Components for odds, markets, betslip, and bet placement

MatchCards.description: Match display components in various layouts

Navigation.description: Tab bars, headers, toolbars, and navigation elements

Forms.description: Input fields, text entry, and user data forms

Filters.description: Search, filtering, sorting, and selection controls

Status.description: Loading, empty states, notifications, and feedback

Promotions.description: Banners, offers, bonuses, and promotional content

Casino.description: Casino game displays, categories, and game cards

Wallet.description: Balance, transactions, deposits, and financial displays

Profile.description: User profile, settings, and account management

UIElements.description: Basic UI building blocks and utility components

ActionButtonBlockView.summary: CTA button for promotional content with enabled/disabled state
ActionButtonBlockView.description: A styled call-to-action button used in promotional detail pages. Supports customizable title text, enabled/disabled states, and triggers navigation to action URLs when tapped. Commonly used for bonus claims and marketing CTAs.

ActionRowView.summary: Generic tappable row for menus, settings, and action lists
ActionRowView.description: A flexible row component for profile menus, settings screens, and action lists. Supports leading icons, titles, subtitles, trailing icons (chevron for navigation), custom backgrounds, and tap feedback animation. Two types: navigation (with chevron) and action.

AdaptiveTabBarView.summary: Multi-configuration tab bar with animated transitions
AdaptiveTabBarView.description: Dynamic tab bar supporting multiple layouts (Sports/Casino) with animated transitions. Maintains navigation history for back navigation, supports blur/solid/transparent backgrounds, and offers five animation types including 3D flips and cube rotations.

AmountPillView.summary: Pill-shaped button displaying monetary amount with selection
AmountPillView.description: A single amount value displayed in a rounded pill container. Used in deposit/stake selection interfaces where users choose predefined amounts. Shows '+' prefix and inverts colors when selected.

AmountPillsContainerView.summary: Horizontal scrollable container of amount selection pills
AmountPillsContainerView.description: Manages a collection of AmountPillView components in a horizontal scroll view. Handles single selection, provides selection callbacks, and commonly used for quick deposit amount selection in first deposit bonus flows.

BetDetailResultSummaryView.summary: Match details card with color-coded bet result status
BetDetailResultSummaryView.description: Two-card stacked layout showing match information with bet type in top card, and color-coded result status pill (won/lost/draw/open) in bottom card. Used in My Bets detail screens.

BetDetailRowView.summary: Label-value row for bet details with corner radius styles
BetDetailRowView.description: Single row with left-aligned label and right-aligned value. Supports standard and header display styles, configurable corner radius (none/top/bottom/all) for grouped lists. Fixed 52pt height.

BetDetailValuesSummaryView.summary: Grouped card displaying bet values in header-content-footer layout
BetDetailValuesSummaryView.description: Organizes BetDetailRowView components into structured summary card with optional header (date), content rows (odds, amounts, stake), and optional footer (result). Used in My Bets detail screens.

BetInfoSubmissionView.summary: Complete bet submission form with summary, input, and place bet action
BetInfoSubmissionView.description: Comprehensive bet placement interface with bet summary rows (odds, potential winnings, win bonus, payout), amount input field, quick-add buttons (+100, +250, +500), and place bet button. Used in Sports and Virtual betslip screens.

BetSummaryRowView.summary: Title-value pair row for bet summary information
BetSummaryRowView.description: Horizontal row with left-aligned title (semibold) and right-aligned value (bold). Used in betslip for showing odds, potential winnings, bonuses, and payout amounts. Supports enabled/disabled states with alpha dimming.

BetTicketStatusView.summary: Color-coded status indicator for bet ticket outcomes
BetTicketStatusView.description: Displays bet result status with icon and label using color-coded backgrounds. Shows won (green), lost (red), draw (yellow), or cashed out states. Fixed 48pt height.

BetslipFloatingView.summary: Floating betslip indicator with selection count and odds boost progress
BetslipFloatingView.description: Two variants (tall/thin) for floating betslip status overlays. Tall shows odds boost promotion progress with animated segments. Auto-hides when no tickets. Shadow effect, tap opens betslip.

BetslipHeaderView.summary: Betslip header adapting to user authentication state
BetslipHeaderView.description: Shows balance for logged-in users or Join Now/Log In buttons for guests. Betslip icon and title on left, close button always visible. Used at top of betslip screens.

BetslipOddsBoostHeaderView.summary: Odds boost promotion progress header in betslip
BetslipOddsBoostHeaderView.description: Shows user progress toward earning odds boost on bets. Displays boost icon, tier info, remaining selections needed, and animated progress segments. Positioned below BetslipHeaderView.

BetslipTicketView.summary: Betslip ticket card with match details, selection, and live odds
BetslipTicketView.description: Single bet selection within betslip showing league, match date, teams, selected outcome, and odds. Animated odds change indicators (up/down arrows), swipe-to-delete close button, disabled state overlay.

BetslipTypeSelectorView.summary: Horizontal tab selector for switching betslip types
BetslipTypeSelectorView.description: Tab row for filtering betslip by bet category (Sports, Virtuals). Manages BetslipTypeTabItemView collection with single selection. Animated transitions, fixed 50pt height.

BetslipTypeTabItemView.summary: Individual tab item for betslip type selection
BetslipTypeTabItemView.description: Single tab option with icon and title displaying selected/unselected states. Animated bottom indicator line highlights selection. 0.3s animated state transitions.

BonusCardView.summary: Card for bonus offers with CTA button and terms
BonusCardView.description: Displays bonus promotions with image, title, description, tag, CTA button, and terms button. Similar to PromotionCardView but includes terms & conditions display requirement.

BonusInfoCardView.summary: Detailed bonus card with status, progress, and expiry
BonusInfoCardView.description: Comprehensive bonus display with optional header image, status indicator (Active/Released), dual amounts (bonus/remaining), wagering progress bar, terms button, and expiry date. Flexible layout auto-hides unavailable elements.

BorderedTextFieldView.summary: Material-design text field with floating label and validation
BorderedTextFieldView.description: Modern text input with floating placeholder labels, animated border with label cutout, password visibility toggle, prefix text, error states, and custom input view support (date pickers). Fixed 56pt height.

BulletItemBlockView.summary: Bullet point list item with highlighted bullet character
BulletItemBlockView.description: Single bullet point with highlight-colored bullet and primary text. Multi-line support, 1.2x line height, designed for promotional content, terms, and informational lists.

ButtonIconView.summary: Button with configurable icon position (left or right)
ButtonIconView.description: Tappable button with icon and text label. Icon can be positioned on either side. Custom or SF Symbol icons, customizable tint color, optional background. 16x16pt icon with 8pt spacing.

ButtonView.summary: Highly customizable button with three visual styles
ButtonView.description: Production-ready button supporting solid background, bordered, and transparent styles. Complete color customization for background, border, and text. Typography control, haptic feedback, enabled/disabled states.

CapsuleView.summary: Pill-shaped badge for labels, status, and tags
CapsuleView.description: Versatile capsule component with perfect pill shape (radius = height/2). Customizable colors, fonts, padding. Supports custom content views. Used for live badges, count badges, status indicators, category tags.

CashoutAmountView.summary: Compact display of cashout title and currency amount
CashoutAmountView.description: Simple row with title label and formatted currency amount. Rounded container background. Fixed 35pt height. Used for showing partial or full cashout amounts in bet ticket interfaces.

CashoutSliderView.summary: Slider for selecting partial cashout amounts with action button
CashoutSliderView.description: Interactive slider for cashout amount selection between min/max values. Dynamic button title updates as slider moves. Custom thumb, highlight colors. 12pt corner radius container.

CashoutSubmissionInfoView.summary: Status notification bar for cashout submission results
CashoutSubmissionInfoView.description: Feedback after cashout showing success/error state with icon, message, and action button. Distinct backgrounds and icons per state. Visibility toggle for show/hide. Fixed 56pt height.

CasinoCategoryBarView.summary: Section header bar with category title and See All action
CasinoCategoryBarView.description: Header for casino game sections with category title on left and action button with count/chevron on right. Secondary background, placeholder state support.

CasinoCategorySectionView.summary: Category section with header and horizontal scrolling game cards
CasinoCategorySectionView.description: Complete casino section with CasinoCategoryBarView header and horizontal CasinoGameCardView collection. Fixed 164x272pt cards, 12pt spacing. Tertiary background. Game selection and category callbacks.

CasinoGameCardView.summary: Detailed game card with image, title, provider, stake, and rating
CasinoGameCardView.description: Rich game card with async image loading, title, provider, min stake, and 5-thunderbolt rating. Loading/failure states. Fixed 164x272pt. Shadow and rounded corners. For horizontal collections.

CasinoGameImageGridSectionView.summary: Casino section with 2-row horizontal scrolling image grid
CasinoGameImageGridSectionView.description: Category header with horizontal grid of game images in 2-row vertical pairs via CasinoGameImagePairView. 100x100pt images, 8pt vertical/12pt horizontal spacing. Ideal for Lite/Crash games.

CasinoGameImagePairView.summary: Vertical container stacking two casino game images
CasinoGameImagePairView.description: Two CasinoGameImageView components stacked vertically. Top game required, bottom optional for odd-numbered lists. Maintains consistent height. 8pt vertical spacing.

CasinoGameImageView.summary: Square image-only card for compact casino game display
CasinoGameImageView.description: Fixed 100x100pt square game image with 16pt corner radius. Async loading from URL/bundle. Loading indicator and failure placeholder. Minimal design for 2-row grid layouts.

CasinoGamePlayModeSelectorView.summary: Full-screen game details overlay with play mode selection
CasinoGamePlayModeSelectorView.description: Modal overlay showing game thumbnail, title, description, and configurable action buttons. Supports filled/outlined/text button styles. Loading overlay with activity indicator. For game launch screens.

CasinoGameSearchedView.summary: Compact search result row for casino games
CasinoGameSearchedView.description: Horizontal row with 56pt square game image, title, provider, and play icon. Image loading states. Fixed 56pt height. 16pt corner radius. For search result lists.
